title: Image Generation Pathway
description: Explore the breadth of AI image creation across tools, communities, and deployment pipelines. Build from core prompt design to advanced SaaS-style generation systems.
overview: This pathway builds from core prompt design to advanced SaaS-style generation systems. Students will learn accessible, monetizable applications—from ComfyUI workflows to image editing with Gemini. Each module combines hands-on practice with industry-standard tools and real-world project applications.
learningOutcomes: Understand types of AI image generation and foundational tools
Master prompt engineering techniques across different models
Design visual workflows with ComfyUI and community tools
Apply LoRA and VAE techniques for model customization

modules.title: Foundations of Image Generation
modules.description: Understand types of AI image generation and foundational tools.
topics: Model types: Stable Diffusion, Imagen, DALL·E, Gemini

resources.title: What is AI Image Generation + Model Types
Overview of Stable Diffusion, Imagen, DALL·E, Gemini (PDF)
Simple Stable Diffusion prompt generation (Colab)
Quiz: 8 MCQ on model types and use-cases
Generate 3 mood-board images for fictional product

modules.title: Prompt Engineering & Gemini Nano Banana (Builder)
modules.description: Master prompt techniques and experiment with Google's advanced image editor.

resources.title: Prompt Crafting + Intro to Gemini Nano Banana
Gemini 2.5 Flash Image capabilities guide
Use Gemini via AI Studio for image editing
Quiz: Identify best prompts for Gemini tasks
Design product mockup with Gemini (upload, edit background, alter pose)

modules.title: Workflow Design with ComfyUI & Web Community Tools (Builder)
modules.description: Learn visual workflows for modular image generation.

resources.title: ComfyUI walkthrough—nodes, pipelines, community models
Guide to Hugging Face Playground & Model Hubs (PDF)
Build ComfyUI flow with LoRA style and VAE upscaling
Quiz: Match node functions (CLIP encode, LoRA apply)
Create reusable ComfyUI pipeline and share config

modules.title: Fine-Tuning with LoRA/VAE Techniques (Innovator)
modules.description: Understand lightweight fine-tuning to specialize image generators.

resources.title: How LoRA and VAE enable personalization
Examples of stylized models and ethical considerations (PDF)
Apply LoRA to base model for unique art style (Colab)
Quiz: Differences between full model vs LoRA fine-tuning
Train/apply LoRA for specific theme (anime, architecture)

modules.title: Monetizable SaaS Prototyping (Advanced Builder)
modules.description: Build a simple Stripe-integrated image-gen web app for real-world use.

resources.title: Prototyping monetizable workflows with Flask or Streamlit
Case study—AI-generated ecommerce mockup service (PDF)
Deploy image generation via Gradio/Flask (Colab)
Quiz: Identify app security requirements
Prototype web interface with prompt upload and image delivery

modules.title: Pathway Capstone — Creative Image Service
modules.description: Build an end-to-end image generation service with UI, prompt controls, and value.

resources.title: Bringing it all together—design, deployment, UX
Ethical deployment, watermarking, and avoiding misuse (PDF)
Deploy via Hugging Face Spaces with Stable Diffusion
Quiz: Ethical scenarios and watermark policies
Capstone: Choose from meme generator, avatar service, or mockup generator
